param

Class Polynomial

  • java.lang.Object
    • param.Polynomial

  • final class Polynomial
extends java.lang.Object
    A polynomial exressed as a sum of terms. Once a polynomial is fully constructed, it is immutable and cannot be changed anymore.
    Author:
    Ernst Moritz Hahn (University of Oxford)

    • Field Detail

      • numVariables

        private int numVariables
        number of variables in this polynomial

      • coefficients

        private java.math.BigInteger[] coefficients
        coefficients of this polynomial.

      • exponents

        private int[] exponents
        exponents of each term. for each term, there are numVariables entries in exponents in this array, followed by the entries for the next term (if any).

      • pointsSeen

        private java.util.HashMap<Point,BigRational> pointsSeen

      • size

        private int size
        current size of the polynomial. used during its construction.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Polynomial

        Polynomial(int numVariables,
           int numTerms)
        Constructs a new polynomial.
        Parameters:
        numVariables - number of variables the polynomial will have
        numTerms - final number of terms after construction

        Adds a term to a polynomial. To be used during its construction.
        Parameters:
        coefficient -
        monomial -

      • equals

        public boolean equals(java.lang.Object obj)
        Checks whether this polynomial is equal to the given object. For this to hold, obj must be a polynomial, and it must be the same polynomial as this polynomial.
        Overrides:
        equals in class java.lang.Object
        Parameters:
        obj - object to compare against
        Returns:
        true iff obj is a polynomial which equals this polynomial

        Returns a hashcode for this polynomial.

        Returns:
        hash code for this polynomial

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Returns a string representation of the polynomial.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        string representation of the polynomial

      • evaluate

        BigRational evaluate(Point point,
                     boolean cancel)
        Evaluates a polynomial at a given point. point must have the same dimension as the number of variables for this to work correctly. cancel specifies whether the result is to be brought into coprime form.
        Parameters:
        point - point to evaluate polynomial at
        cancel - whether to make result coprime
        Returns:
        value of polynomial at given point

      • evaluate

        BigRational evaluate(Point point)
        Evaluates a polynomial at a given point. point must have the same dimension as the number of variables for this to work correctly. Result is brought into coprime form.
        Parameters:
        point - point to evaluate polynomial at
        Returns:
        value of polynomial at given point

      • check

        boolean check(Point point,
              boolean strict)
        Checks whether the value of this polynomial is (strictly) greater zero.
        Parameters:
        point - point to evaluate polynomial at
        strict - true for strictly greater zero, greater or equal else
        Returns:
        true if value at given point is (strictly) greater zero
